TestDescriptor.Name: Test the reading of simpleType declared in different namespace
TestDescriptor.Author: Arnaud Blandin
TestDescriptor.Comment: This test ensures that XML Schema built-in types are correctly read when declared in the schema namespace (even default) and that an exception is thrown when the type is not declared in the schema Namespace

BugFix.Comment: Added default namespace saving in the schema reader

UnitTestCase.Comment: Added for default namespace bug reported by Stephan Goetter and Erik Ostermueller (kvisco - 20021017)
